edu.ucla.sspace.text

Class UsenetCorpusReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.text.DirectoryCorpusReader<Document>
      • edu.ucla.sspace.text.UsenetCorpusReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CorpusReader<Document>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemporalUsenetCorpusReader

    public class UsenetCorpusReader
extends DirectoryCorpusReader<Document>
    A DirectoryCorpusReader for the Usenet corpus provided by the Westbury Lab. The corpus filenames are expected to remain unchanged from how they were specified, i.e. have the numeric timestamp naming convention.
    Author:
    Keith Stevens

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UsenetCorpusReader.InnerIterator 

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class edu.ucla.sspace.text.DirectoryCorpusReader

        DirectoryCorpusReader.BaseFileIterator

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UsenetCorpusReader()
      Creates a reader for USENET document, starting with the specified file.
      UsenetCorpusReader(boolean includeTimestamps)
      Creates a reader for USENET document, starting with the specified file and, if includeTimestamps is true, prepending the creation date of each document as the first token in the document.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Iterator<Document> corpusIterator(Iterator<File> fileIter)
      Returns an Iterator over documents contained in the Files traversed by fileIter.

        public UsenetCorpusReader(boolean includeTimestamps)

    • Method Detail

      • corpusIterator

        protected Iterator<Document> corpusIterator(Iterator<File> fileIter)
        Description copied from class: DirectoryCorpusReader
        Returns an Iterator over documents contained in the Files traversed by fileIter. Sub-classes are encouraged to sub-class BaseFileIterator for the return value of this method.
        Specified by:
        corpusIterator in class DirectoryCorpusReader<Document>
